messages.label: error

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select `slug`, `id` from `posts` where (`slug` = 'hello' or `slug` LIKE 'hello-%') and `visible` = '1'

insert into `posts` (`category_id`, `user_id`, `title`, `body`, `image_path`, `slug`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values ('3', '8', 'hello', 'Store the uploaded file on a filesystem disk with public visibility.\r\n\r\n', 'images/65ad32032fa1bf31ff5658765686450c.jpeg', 'hello', '2016-10-25 18:22:27', '2016-10-25 18:22:27')

params.3: Store the uploaded file on a filesystem disk with public visibility.
